PersonalStatement.text: Lisa Carpenter, born on 1966-12-07, is a Female based in Julieland, Trinidad and Tobago. She is Divorced and holds Bangladeshi nationality. Currently working at Phelps-Henderson.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Rodriguez Ltd from 2011 to 2019.
Senior Financial Analyst at Phelps-Henderson, 2020 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from Tokushima University
Master's in Engineering from Universidad del Valle

PersonalSkills.text: Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.
Communication: Strong ability to present technical information to non-technical stakeholders.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys reading.
